Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 52nd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2007...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Seattle on 2/4/2010 (Going to SEA: C J. Montero, 3B M. Dominguez, P T. Scheppers. Going to PIT: P B. Ford, P C. Politte)...
Had first career hit on 4/10/2014, off Sean Marshall (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2014, off Derek Holland (CLE)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Los Angeles (A) on 8/17/2014...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 9/27/2016...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/10/2019, hitting .480 with 5 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/29/2019, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/9/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
